sen.j: 日野 資宣（ひの すけのぶ、1224年 - 1292年）は、日野家16代当主。
sen.e: Sukenobu HINO (1224 - 1292) was the 16th head of the Hino family.
Sukenobu HINO (1224 - 1292) was the 16th head of the Hino family.
Sukenobu HINO (1224 - 1292) was the 16th head of the Hino family.
He was the second son of the 15th family head, Iemitsu HINO
He was the second son of the 15th family head, Iemitsu HINO.
sen.cmt: 文尾にピリオドを付けました。
sen.e: He was the second son of the 15th family head, Iemitsu HINO.
His mother was the daughter of FUJIWARA no Tadatsuna.
His mother was the daughter of FUJIWARA no Tadatsuna.
His mother was the daughter of FUJIWARA no Tadatsuna.

sen.cmt: 主体は、「日野資宣」なので、"His son"から始まる文に変更しました。

sen.e: The highest rank he attained was Minbukyo (Minister of Popular Affaires)
He held the office of Minbukyo (Minister of Popular Affairs).
sen.cmt: 位は→He held the office of民部卿→Minbukyo (Minister of Popular Affairs（Affairesのスペルを訂正しました。）文尾にピリオドを付けました。
sen.e: He held the office of Minbukyo (Minister of Popular Affairs).

sen.j: 1246年から1279年の間に『仁部記』を著した。
sen.e: He wrote "Nibuki (仁部記)" during the period of 1246 to 1279.
He wrote "Ninbuki " (Sukenobu's Diary) during a period from 1246 to 1279.
sen.cmt: ～から～の間→period from ～ to ～『仁部記』→"Ninbuki" (Sukenobu's Diary)（京都府立総合資料館所蔵 貴重書データーベース資料解説（http://www3.library.pref.kyoto.jp/infolib/meta_ex/RBDBSearch.cgi?IS_START=1&IS_STYLE=default&IS_KEY_S99=1&IS_SCH=CSV&IS_TAG_S99=Cul1&META_KIND=NOFRAME&GRP_ID=G0000013&SUM_KIND=CsvInitSearch&IS_TYPE=csv&DB_ID=G0000013RAREBOOKS&SUM_NUMBER=20&IS_KIND=CsvDetail&IS_NUMBER=1&IS_TAG_SP1=Cul3&IS_KEY_SP1=177）より）
sen.e: He wrote "Ninbuki " (Sukenobu's Diary) during a period from 1246 to 1279.
